subject: Re: Progress towards TP6?
body:
Andrew,

 > I'm very happy with the progress I've made over the past few days, with
 > MMC write support nicely capping off the work by metze and others on
 > schema.

This is great stuff Andrew! I'll be back home on Sunday and I'm really
looking forward to starting to look at this.

I've just grabbed the latest svn updates for the plane flight. Now if
I can just stay awake ...... zzzzzzz

Cheers, Tridge
